"I did a remodel and repairs and their work is top notch." "The project was well communicated everyday, ran smoothly from start to finish!"

We have an old pool way out in the country and it's not easy to find people who are willing to travel here. Matt hooked us up! H&H replaced our mastic, acid washed our pool, replaced our 20+ yr old plumbing (shout out to Vicencio Pool … More

H&H did an amazing job refinishing our pool. Tracy provided her expertise and knowledge helping us decide on pool plaster. We are so glad we went with the Hydrazzo Pacific Blue. It’s gorgeous!  Her crew is top notch!

I’m 58 years old. Never have I left a review for anything good or bad. That being said I want everyone to know what an outstanding job these guys do. Tracy was spot on with her whole bunch. Not one hiccup. My pool is 21 years old had cracks … More
